summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackFarmacy's clinically-proven vitamin C brightening eye cream that instantly reduces the look of dark circles, depuffs + smoothes fine lines. Encapsulated caffeine + upcycled cranberry peptide help smooth crow’s feet + fight wrinkles over time. Dermatologist-tested + ophthalmologist-approved!
details: DetailsBenefitsBrightens in minutes. Formulated with tetrahexyldecyl (THD) ascorbate, a highly stable + antioxidant-rich derivative of vitamin C that brightens the eye area, reducing the size + intensity of dark circles - instantly + over time.Combats Dark Circles + Depuffs, Instantly. Encapsulated caffeine + upcycled cranberry peptide penetrate the skin to immediately depuff and combat dark circles + fine linesReplenishes hydration. Farmacy's antioxidant-rich honey blend soothes + moisturizes, while hyaluronic acid delivers instant hydrationPreps for makeup. This silky honey eye cream boosts radiance while creating the perfect canvas for bold eye makeup looksKey Ingredients3% Vitamin C (THD Ascorbate): Visibly brightens and reduces dark circlesEncapsulated Caffeine and Upcycled Cranberry Peptide: Reduce the look of puffiness and fine lines while targeting dark circlesProprietary Buckwheat-Honey Blend: Provides lasting hydration and soothes skinResearch ResultsClinically proven to instantly combat dark circles + fine lines100% showed a brighter undereye area91% showed less visible fine linesBased on clinical testing on 35 subjects after 1 applicationItem 2635157How To UseUse as the last step in your skincare routine, before SPFTap and gently smooth onto eye areaUse morning and eveningSafe to use around entire eye area, including eyelidsPro tip:Apply under makeup for the perfect radiant baseIngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Pentaerythrityltetraisostearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter,Cetearyl Alcohol, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Cetearyl Olivate, Pentyleneglycol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Sorbitanolivate, Boron Nitride,Betaine,Caffeine, Hyaluronic Acid, Ceramide Np,Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Coffea Arabica (Coffee)Seed Extract,Honey Extract/ Mel/ Extrait De Miel,Propolis Extract, Royal Jellyextract, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Fruit Extract, Citrusaurantium Sinensis Peel Extract, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Fruit Extract,Ascorbic Acid, Tridecapeptide-1,Triolein,Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6,Hydroxyacetophenone, Tocopheryl Acetate, Astaxanthin, Allantoin, Hippophaerhamnoides Oil, Tocopherol, Ubiquinone, Lecithin, Haematococcus Pluvialisextract, Glyceryl Dioleate, Sclerotium Gum, Hexamidine Diisethionate, Sodiumphytate, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid,1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl GlycolShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use as the last step in your skincare routine, before SPFTap and gently smooth onto eye areaUse morning and eveningSafe to use around entire eye area, including eyelidsPro tip:Apply under makeup for the perfect radiant base

reviews.headline: Great Product but Check Packaging
reviews.comments: I love this eye cream!  I just purchased my second jar.  When I got it home and opened it, it was dried out and crusty around the top. Ulta is very helpful with returns, so I have no complaints other than to say check your products before you make a purchase to save the hassle of returning.

reviews.headline: Nice, but won't purchase again.
reviews.comments: The consistency is nice and does work somewhat.  It leaves a greasy feeling for hours after.  Its not bothersome by any means, just strange it doesn't absorb better

reviews.headline: Does not work well with makeup, despite advertising
reviews.comments: I like the consistency of the cream and how it's brightened the skin around my eyes and helped hydrate my eyelids, which were so dry and irritated from the freezing cold that they were flaking and peeling. I dont like that it makes my liquid eyeliner almost impossible to put on. Even just a little amount of this is too heavy and greasy for my pen to stick and it ends up fading or rubbing off before the day is over and I look like I showed up to work in yesterday's makeup. Its embarassing and disappointing that it does this so I cant use it in the AM unless its a day I dont plan to wear makeup.

reviews.headline: So far so good!
reviews.comments: I only used it once but was very impressed with the somewhat immediate difference. I do use the Pharmacy moisturizer and then this on top of it. I'm not sure which way to do it was just what happened. Period. I could tell a little bit goes a long way. It has a pleasant sleep...

reviews.headline: I don't like it
reviews.comments: It's too harsh and make my skin burn

reviews.headline: love!!
reviews.comments:
i absolutely love this eye cream so much, its one of the only
things that helped my eczema! absolutely recommend, it definitely is on the pricier side but it's absolutely worth it! will be repurchasing when im out!

reviews.headline: love!!
reviews.comments:
i absolutely love this eye cream so much, its one of the only
things that helped my eczema! absolutely recommend, it definitely is on the pricier side but it's absolutely worth it! will be repurchasing when im out!

reviews.headline: Like it
reviews.comments: I like this product.  I can only use it at night since it seems a little strong for my eyes. And just a little bit is needed at a time.

reviews.headline: Best morning eye cream!
reviews.comments: I have bags. They are starting to be more prominent since I lost weight so I was looking for an eye cream to help. I bought several, including the Byoma.  Most of the eye creams for bags did a better job of shrinking the bag but then there were more wrinkles and my makeup wouldn't blend well. This one may not offer the best shrinkage of bags but it allowed a healthy under eye glow, nourishment and subtle shrinkage. I could adjust this review if needed but I would think its better for the eye not to contract so much anyway. That could make wrinkles worse. Best part of this one is it's safe for eyelids. I am sure over time the look of my eye bags will improve too. But due to nourishing not a temporary tightening.

reviews.headline: Favorite eye cream
reviews.comments: I have used the Drunk Elephant C-Tango eye cream for a year. I can't wear it under makeup because it makes my concealer patchy, and i don't see any difference in my dark circles. I switched to this one and my undereyes look hydrated, smooth, and it wears beautifully under my Nars concealer. Very happy!

reviews.headline: Smooth
reviews.comments: Goes on smooth and non greasy. Wear under makeup and at bedtime

reviews.headline: Jar was half empty!
reviews.comments: Ordered serum, eye and face moisturizer. The eye cream was hslf full so o returned. I received a new shipment and that one to was half full. The face moisturizer kar was full so not sure why the eye cream jars are only getting filled halfway for almost $50! I thought id give this new line a shot bit most likely will not be reordering.

reviews.headline: Hydrating
reviews.comments:
The eye cream goes on smooth and dries quickly, it is moisturizing yet not greasy feeling. It helps to plump and minimize wrinkles around the eyes. I like that it works well under makeup without, because of the nice texture it is easy to blend the corrector or foundation effortlessly. It definitely works well on my sensitive undereyes. 

Gifted by Farmacy Beauty.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Gifted by farmacy beauty I am loving this farmacy eye cream it's super luxurious and it's ultra hydrating. I would highly recommend all my family and friends. The packaging is also super cute. This product is a 10 out of 10. I am so in love and will purchase againI'm

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I was gifted by farmacybeaity. I've been using this eye cream for the past week and I've been seeing such a difference in my under eyes. Didn't realize how much hydration I was missing especially during the winter time. Definitely have seen some improvement on the brightness as well.

reviews.headline: Love this under eye cream
reviews.comments: I received this eye cream as a gift and I'm really enjoying it so far. I have noticed a significant difference in my dark circles under my eyes. I usually use this eye cream in the morning as part of my morning skin care routine and I feel like it keeps my under eyes moisturized and bright all day

reviews.headline: super creamy
reviews.comments: This honey eye cream is absolutely amazing ! I love the entire pharmacy honey products.  I use this eye cream along with the face moisturizing ceramicide and its absolutely wonderful ! Creamy texture and doesn't irritate or pull my skin , absolutely fabulous.  Gifted complimentary from farmacy beauty

reviews.headline: The best!
reviews.comments: This eye cream is a game-changer! It's rich and nourishing, perfect for my sensitive eyes. I've noticed a significant reduction in puffiness and dark circles. The formula is gentle and non-irritating, leaving my skin feeling soft and hydrated all day. Highly recommend! Gifted by Farmacy.

reviews.headline: I love this eye cream!!!
reviews.comments: Wake Up Honey Eye Cream was gifted to me by Farmacy Beauty. It comes in a beautiful orange hexagonal glass jar with screw on top. The texture is a dreamy orange cream that is lightweight and perfect for the under eye area. My dark circles appear lighter and my under eyes look brighter. My under eye area also looks and feels much more hydrated. I can't wait to try more Farmacy Beauty products because I love this eye cream!!!

reviews.headline: Hydrating with slight brightening
reviews.comments: This eye cream is gentle and hydrating, making it great for my sensitive under-eye area. It helps smooth fine lines and reduces puffiness after a few uses.  After using this for a few weeks I noticed my under eye area looks slightly brighter. This was gifted by Farmacy Beauty.

media.headline: A really soothing & hydrating eye cream
Just what my tired eyes needed !
Just what my tired eyes needed !

faceoff_positive.comments: If you're anything like me, the first thing you notice in the morning isn't the birds chirping—it's the tired, puffy eyes staring back at you. Enter Farmacy's Wake Up Honey Eye Cream—a brightening eye cream that feels like a small miracle in a jar. I've been testing this for a few weeks now, and let me tell you, it's become a permanent part of my routine. Let's start with the texture: it's buttery, smooth, and oh-so-luxurious. The moment I dab it under my eyes, it just melts into my skin like honey on warm toast. No tugging, no sticky residue—just pure, hydrating goodness that makes my under-eye area feel nourished and pampered. What makes this eye cream a standout is its clinical formula. The 3% vitamin C (THD ascorbate) works overtime to visibly brighten dark circles. And let's talk about those mornings when the puffiness makes me look like I pulled an all-nighter (even though I didn't). That's where the encapsulated caffeine and upcycled cranberry peptide come to the rescue—instantly depuffing and smoothing the fine lines around my eyes. I'm not exaggerating when I say I've noticed a visible difference in the intensity of my dark circles. And if hydration is your thing, this cream delivers that in spades too. The proprietary buckwheat-honey blend and hyaluronic acid give my skin a plump, dewy finish that feels as good as it looks. It's so hydrating that my concealer glides on like a dream afterward—no creasing, no caking, just flawless application. Another detail I love? It's dermatologist-tested, ophthalmologist-approved, and completely safe for sensitive eyes like mine. Even after long days or sleepless nights, this cream never irritates my skin. Who is this for? Honestly, anyone who wants to brighten, depuff, and hydrate their under-eye area while smoothing fine lines over time. Whether you're dealing with stubborn dark circles or just want to add a touch of luxury to your routine, this eye cream checks all the boxes. Farmacy's Wake Up Honey Eye Cream doesn't just brighten my eyes—it elevates my mornings. If you've been on the hunt for an eye cream that feels indulgent yet clinically effective, this one deserves your attention. My tired eyes are officially hooked!
faceoff_positive.headline: Just what my tired eyes needed !

faceoff_negative.comments: I like the consistency of the cream and how it's brightened the skin around my eyes and helped hydrate my eyelids, which were so dry and irritated from the freezing cold that they were flaking and peeling. I dont like that it makes my liquid eyeliner almost impossible to put on. Even just a little amount of this is too heavy and greasy for my pen to stick and it ends up fading or rubbing off before the day is over and I look like I showed up to work in yesterday's makeup. Its embarassing and disappointing that it does this so I cant use it in the AM unless its a day I dont plan to wear makeup.
